name: personal-ea
description: Personal AI Assistant System - API-first microservices architecture

scripts.validate:api: npm run lint:api && echo 'All API specifications are valid'
scripts.mock:all: concurrently "npm run mock:email" "npm run mock:goals" "npm run mock:calendar"
scripts.mock:docker:rebuild: docker-compose -f docker-compose.mock.yml down && docker-compose -f docker-compose.mock.yml up -d --build
scripts.mock:status: curl -s http://localhost:8083/v1/health && curl -s http://localhost:8085/v1/health && curl -s http://localhost:8086/v1/health
scripts.docs:build: redoc-cli build docs/email-service-api-v1.yaml --output docs/email-service-docs.html && redoc-cli build docs/goal-strategy-service-api-v1.yaml --output docs/goal-strategy-docs.html && redoc-cli build docs/calendar-service-api-v1.yaml --output docs/calendar-service-docs.html
scripts.generate:types: openapi-typescript docs/email-service-api-v1.yaml --output types/email-service.ts && openapi-typescript docs/goal-strategy-service-api-v1.yaml --output types/goal-strategy.ts && openapi-typescript docs/calendar-service-api-v1.yaml --output types/calendar.ts
scripts.test:contract: npm run test:contract:api && npm run test:contract:pact
scripts.test:contract:api: npm run test:contract:schemathesis && npm run test:contract:dredd
scripts.test:contract:schemathesis: schemathesis run docs/email-service-api-v1.yaml --base-url http://localhost:8083 --hypothesis-max-examples=50 && schemathesis run docs/goal-strategy-service-api-v1.yaml --base-url http://localhost:8085 --hypothesis-max-examples=50 && schemathesis run docs/calendar-service-api-v1.yaml --base-url http://localhost:8086 --hypothesis-max-examples=50
scripts.test:contract:dredd: dredd docs/email-service-api-v1.yaml http://localhost:8083 && dredd docs/goal-strategy-service-api-v1.yaml http://localhost:8085 && dredd docs/calendar-service-api-v1.yaml http://localhost:8086
scripts.test:contract:pact: npm run test:contract:pact:provider && npm run test:contract:pact:consumer
scripts.test:contract:mock: npm run mock:all & sleep 5 && npm run test:contract:api; kill %1

author: PersonalEA Team
